images.name: Digital Mandala
images.desc: The triangle was created by hand and then replicated on a computer into a mandala.

images.name: Colour Collage
images.desc: This is an exploration of colour.

images.name: Duck!
images.desc: An exploration of form and shading. The duck was made in a 3d modeling program, and then printed out and drawn using pencils.

images.name: Time-travelling person
images.desc: A person magically gets older. Meant as an exploration of drawing people and shading.

images.name: Fish
images.desc: A colourful fish drawn using a grid and coloured pencil crayons.
